EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-06-20-Cisco-UCS-Demo.2018-06-19 Last Chance Invite Cisco-UCS - June_Web
EmailTemplate.subject: [Last Chance] Will you join us tomorrow?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-ucs-demo/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us tomorrow at 11am EST while Director of Technical Marketing and Technology Evangelist, Eric Wright leads a live demo featuring Turbonomic automated control and optimization of a Cisco UCS environment. With the powerful combination of Turbonomic and Cisco UCS, we further extend the full stack capabilities of workload automation in your data center.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-ucs-demo/]]>
In this 30-minute live demo, Eric will showcase the complete understanding and control – extending from the physical to the virtual layers of the stack – that Turbonomic brings to a Cisco UCS environment.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you can't join the live webinar but would like to learn more, please feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-ucs-demo/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterward.
